mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between British officials about negotiations between Kuwait and Saudi Arabia concerning the signing of three agreements between the two countries; a trade agreement, a Bon Voisinageagreement and an extradition agreement.Negotiations regarding whether certain tribes should be granted Kuwaiti or Saudi Arabian nationality are also discussed in the file.A number of drafts of the three agreements - in both English and Arabic - are contained in the file accompanied with various revisions to their texts.
